customer_reviews.text: Initially I was worried when I put this monitor into 4k resolution as the mouse was laggy and wasn't moving as smooth as it should. For me it was set to Wide when I got it, and when in "Wide" it limits to 30Hz. So change that then find out how to enable 60hz on your pc. product_meta.title: LG 27UD68P 27 inch 4K UHD Height Adjustable IPS Monitor (3840 x 2160, 2x HDMI, DisplayPort, 300 cd/m2, 5ms, AMD Freesync)
product_meta.description:
With FreeSync, you can play any high-end game without screen tearing and stuttering that occur from the difference between a graphics card’s frame rate and monitor’s refresh rate. Black Stabiliser identifies the darkest areas and makes them brighter so that users can find enemies hiding in the shadows, with the assistance of Dynamic Action Sync(DAS) which allows users to attack enemies faster with less lag time. The LG Ultra HD IPS monitor offers both a larger workspace and accurate and detailed expression. In particular, the sRGB over 99% prevents gaps in colour space, and the expression.Screen Split divides the display for different tasks by resizing the windows on-screen. With PIP Mode you can work while watching a video in a window floating on the screen. With up to 14 options available offering an efficient and professional working environment.

Wall Mount - 100mmx100mm
